posts.post_content:
Hi all,

Looking to add cards to my set, still need many, including HOFers. Let me know what you have.

Please:

1) only SGC

2) happy to pay market prices, no links to SGC 50 cards for $140 please

thanks - rob
[url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]

Hi Rob,
I have about nine total SGC 60-70s, but would much prefer to trade them for similarly graded/appearing PSAs rather than sell.  If that's an option for you (or anyone else reading), we can share the names and scans.
Thanks,
--S
sorry, not an option - at least from me
